summary: Added procedural monster abilities (active kits) rolled at spawn for Elite/Champion/Mythic monsters, saved/loaded persistently.
Implemented AI usage for abilities with cooldowns: Pounce, Toxic Miasma, Cinder Nova, Arcane Ward (shielding), Summon Minions, and Screech (confusion).
Made monster timed effects tick correctly for regen/shield/invis and made shielding provide monster damage reduction.
LOOK mode now surfaces proc abilities, and XP scaling accounts for ability count.
Save version bumped to v50 to persist procedural abilities + cooldowns.
